nested_items.name: datasetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the dataset.

nested_items.name: datasetArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dataset. The format is arn:${Partition}:iotsitewise:${Region}:${Account}:dataset/${DatasetId}.

nested_items.name: datasetName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset.

nested_items.name: datasetDescription
nested_items.description: A description about the dataset, and its functionality.

nested_items.name: datasetSource
nested_items.description: The data source for the dataset.

nested_items.name: sourceType
nested_items.description: The type of data source for the dataset.

nested_items.name: sourceFormat
nested_items.description: The format of the dataset source associated with the dataset.

nested_items.name: sourceDetail
nested_items.description: The details of the dataset source associated with the dataset.

nested_items.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_items.description: The knowledgeBaseArn details for the Kendra dataset source.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The roleARN details for the Kendra dataset source.

nested_items.name: datasetStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset. This contains the state and any error messages. State is CREATING after a successfull call to this API, and any associated error message. The state is ACTIVE when ready to use.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current status of the dataset.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: details
nested_items.description: A list of detailed errors.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: datasetCreationDate
nested_items.description: The dataset creation date, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: datasetLastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date the dataset was last updated, in Unix epoch time.

nested_items.name: datasetVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the dataset.
